Hello,

I figured I would ask before I went foward. I have a character in mind
for Hydras' new second in command, or security officer - or however he
wants to use him. I could play it myself, but I would much rather have
a player use the character rather than myself. Plus I would think it
would help Airly to have other players on his team. I have his team in
place but he is woefully short on other players.

He should be coming available very soon and I wanted to see if anyone
out there wanted to take him on.

To give you a little in game history: he is a transmetal and a Mega
sized character, one who was loyal to BW's Megatron and now Hydras,
since Hydras was once partly Megatron.

If you think you are interested please let me know on or off list.
This is open to anyone who feels they can keep up with posting at
least a few times a week and can handle being Hydras' subordinate.

From what I can see Hydras is a good commander and he doesn't bite . .
. MUCH! :)

Come one come all! :)

- Preston
